jd_information.description: Company Website: www.edterra.comBackground preferred:· Must have minimum 3-4 years of field sales experience in travel or education sales or Banking or Insurance or recruitment sales etc.· Responsible for business acquisition both from existing and new clients by selling innovative range of student travel services to premier schools as per targets· Make powerful presentations to students, teachers, principals and management to increase enrolmentSalary: Our salaries are competitive and commensurate with prevailing industry standards.Company: Edterra EdventuresLocation:MumbaiFurthers Details Call Sonal 9821593841
